title: New: Fawn Empire – I Love Her Films
body:
After a more than emotionally testing evening, this gorgeous instrumental affair from **Fawn Empire** (Aka **Louis Reeve**) is proving the ideal antidote to those mercenary thoughts.

_I Love Her Films_ is the dreamscape in which demons patrol, wistful yet strangely apologetic with it’s desire. This is for you AM.

I Love Her Films is the dreamscape in which demons patrol, wistful yet strangely apologetic with it’s desire. This is for you AM.
